select MS_CARGO.MS_CARGO_ID , MS_CARGO.CARGO_NO , MS_CARGO.CARGO_NAME , MS_CARGO.RENEW_DATE , MS_CARGO.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_CARGO.TS , MS_CARGO.DELETE_FLAG , MS_CARGO.SEND_FLAG , MS_CARGO.VESSEL_ID , MS_CARGO.DATA_NO , MS_CARGO.USER_KEY, MS_CARGO.NINUSHI
from MS_CARGO where DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_CARGO ( MS_CARGO_ID , CARGO_NO , CARGO_NAME , NINUSHI , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , USER_KEY, DATA_NO, TS ) VALUES ( :MS_CARGO_ID, :CARGO_NO , :CARGO_NAME , :NINUSHI , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :USER_KEY , :DATA_NO, :TS )

UPDATE MS_CARGO SET CARGO_NO = :CARGO_NO, CARGO_NAME = :CARGO_NAME , NINUSHI = :NINUSHI, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, TS = :TS
WHERE MS_CARGO_ID = :MS_CARGO_ID
